Actions.Name: Add a watermark to PDF
Actions.Description: Adds a text watermark to PDF

Actions.Name: Fill merge fields in DOCX document
Actions.Description: It takes a DOCX document with merge fields and replaces them by specified data. The keys in data object should be the same as names of MergeFields (Express block) in document

Actions.Name: Create DOCX document from template
Actions.Description: Created Word DOCX document from template. More information: https://plumsail.com/docs/actions/v1.x/document-generation/docx/index.html

Actions.Name: Create HTML from template
Actions.Description: It takes input HTML template string or file and replaces special {{Tokens}} by specified data. We use Mustache framework for templates internally. More information about templates in Mustache docs: http://mustache.github.io/mustache.5.html

Actions.Name: Create PPTX document from template
Actions.Description: Created PowerPoint PPTX document from template.

Actions.Name: Create XLSX document from template
Actions.Description: Created Excel XLSX document from template. More information:  https://plumsail.com/docs/actions/v1.x/document-generation/xlsx/index.html

Actions.Name: Compress PDF document
Actions.Description: Compress pdf document size if possible

Actions.Name: Csv to Excel
Actions.Description: Converts CSV file to Excel

Actions.Name: Convert DOC to DOCX
Actions.Description: It takes DOC document and converts it to DOCX

Actions.Name: Convert DOCX to PDF
Actions.Description: It takes DOCX document and converts it to PDF

Actions.Name: Extract text from PDF document
Actions.Description: It takes PDF document and extracts text to Raw or HTML format

Actions.Name: Fill in PDF Form
Actions.Description: Filling out PDF form by provided data

Actions.Name: Get Form from PDF
Actions.Description: Returns fillable form data from PDF as JSON

Actions.Name: Get information about PDF protection
Actions.Description: Returns information whether the document is password protected

Actions.Name: Convert HTML to PDF
Actions.Description: It takes HTML markup, renders it and converts to PDF document

Actions.Name: Merge Docx
Actions.Description: It takes an array of Docx documents and merge it into single file

Actions.Name: Merge PDF
Actions.Description: It takes an array of PDF documents and merge it

Actions.Name: Parse CSV
Actions.Description: It works like Parse JSON but for CSV file

Actions.Name: Convert PDF to Image
Actions.Description: It takes PDF document and converts it to Image (jpeg, png, gif, bmp)

Actions.Name: Convert PPT to PPTX
Actions.Description: It takes PPT document and converts it to PPTX

Actions.Name: Convert PPTX to PDF
Actions.Description: It takes PPTX document and converts it to PDF

Actions.Name: Protect PDF document
Actions.Description: Adds passwords, copy-, printing-, and other protections to PDF file

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Match
Actions.Description: Searches an input string for all occurrences of a regular expression and returns all the matches. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Replace
Actions.Description: In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a regular expression pattern with a specified replacement string. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Test
Actions.Description: Indicates whether the regular expression specified in the Regex constructor finds a match in a specified input string. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Split PDF
Actions.Description: It takes PDF document and split it

Actions.Name: Convert XLS to XLSX
Actions.Description: It takes XLS document and converts it to XLSX

Actions.Name: Convert XLSX to PDF
Actions.Description: It takes XLSX document and converts it to PDF

Actions.Name: Start document generation process
Actions.Description: Fill a template related to the selected process with the JSON data

Actions.Name: When process is finished
Actions.Description: Creates a webhook that runs when the process is finished
